values: If something is solemn, then it is serious and honest.
The professor preferred a solemn relationship between him and his students.
adj. very serious or formal in manner 严肃的
somber
adj. 庄严的，严肃的；隆重的，郑重的

- adj. 严肃的
- 庄重的，郑重的
- 庄严的；隆重的

solemnly

名 词:  
solemnness
